props.collapseInMenu: When true, overflowing breadcrumb items are collapsed into a contextual menu rather than a static ellipsis.
props.collapseFrom: Determines the number of leading breadcrumb items that remain visible before collapsing the middle items.
props.divider: Specifies the dividing character between items.
props.ellipsis: Text displayed when breadcrumb items collapsed.
props.icons: Specifies that the dividers between items are [v-icon](/components/icons)s.
props.justifyEnd: Align the breadcrumbs at the end.
props.large: Increase the font-size of the breadcrumb item text to 16px (14px default).
props.totalVisible: Determines how many breadcrumb items can be shown before other items are collapsed.

slots.prepend: The slot used for prepend content.
slots.title: The slot used to display the title of each breadcrumb.
slots.listItem: The slot used for customizing each item inside the contextual menu when breadcrumbs items are collapsed.
